SELECT T1."商品管理番号" as productno, T1."商品分類" as productdiv, T1."SKU番号" as sku, T1."ASIN番号" as asin, T1."商品名称" as productname, ( SELECT count(*) FROM "MASTER_出品マスタ情報" T2 WHERE T1."商品管理番号" = T2."商品管理番号" AND T2."商品種別" = '子商品' AND T2."店舗名" = :shop ) as subq, ( SELECT count(distinct coalesce(T2."サイズ",'')) FROM "MASTER_出品マスタ情報" T2 WHERE T1."商品管理番号" = T2."商品管理番号" AND T2."商品種別" = '子商品' AND T2."色" = T4."色" AND T2."店舗名" = :shop ) as subcq, T1."商品写真" as productpic, T5."色" as subcolor, T4."サイズ" as subsize, T4."SKU番号" as subsku, T4."ASIN番号" as sukuasin FROM "MASTER_出品マスタ情報" T1, ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T3."商品管理番号", T3."色", T3."サイズ", T3."SKU番号", T3."ASIN番号", ROW_NUMBER() OVER(partition BY T3."商品管理番号" ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(T3."並び順",'999')) NB FROM "MASTER_出品マスタ情報" T3 WHERE T3."商品種別" = '子商品' AND T3."店舗名" = :shop ) TEMP WHERE TEMP.NB = 1 ) T4, "MASTER_写真情報" T5
WHERE T1."商品管理番号" = T4."商品管理番号" AND T1."商品種別" = '親商品' AND T1."店舗名" = :shop AND T4."商品管理番号" = T5."商品管理番号" AND T4."色" = T5."色" AND T1."店舗名" = T5."店舗名"
ORDER BY T1."商品管理番号"

SELECT T5."商品管理番号" as productno, T5."色" as subcolor, T5."サイズ" as subsize, T5."SKU番号" as subsku, T5."ASIN番号" as subasin, T5."並び順" FROM "MASTER_出品マスタ情報" T5, ( SELECT distinct TEMP."商品管理番号", TEMP."色" FROM ( SELECT T3."商品管理番号", T3."色", T3."サイズ", T3."SKU番号", T3."ASIN番号", ROW_NUMBER() OVER(partition BY T3."商品管理番号" ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(T3."並び順",'999')) NB FROM "MASTER_出品マスタ情報" T3 WHERE T3."商品種別" = '子商品' AND T3."店舗名" = :shop ) TEMP WHERE TEMP.NB = 1 ORDER BY TEMP."商品管理番号" ) TEMP1 WHERE T5."商品管理番号" = TEMP1."商品管理番号" AND T5."色" = TEMP1."色" AND T5."店舗名" = :shop AND TO_NUMBER(T5."並び順",'999') > 1 ORDER BY T5."商品管理番号",TO_NUMBER(T5."並び順",'999')

SELECT TEMP."商品管理番号" as productno, TEMP."色" as subcolor, TEMP."サイズ" as subsize, TEMP."SKU番号" as subsku, TEMP."ASIN番号" as subasin FROM ( SELECT T3."商品管理番号", T3."色", T3."サイズ", T3."SKU番号", T3."ASIN番号", ROW_NUMBER() OVER(partition BY T3."商品管理番号" ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(T3."並び順",'999')) NB FROM "MASTER_出品マスタ情報" T3 WHERE T3."商品種別" = '子商品' AND T3."店舗名" = :shop ) TEMP WHERE TEMP.NB > 1

SELECT T1."商品管理番号" as productno, T1."色" as subcolor, T5."商品写真" as productpic,
( SELECT count(distinct coalesce(T2."サイズ",'')) FROM "MASTER_出品マスタ情報" T2 WHERE T2."商品管理番号" = T1."商品管理番号" AND T2."商品種別" = '子商品' AND T2."色" = T1."色" AND T2."店舗名" = :shop ) as subcq,
T1."サイズ" as subsize, T1."SKU番号" as subsku, T1."ASIN番号" as subasin, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(partition BY T1."商品管理番号",T1."色" ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(T1."並び順",'999')) "subsort" FROM "MASTER_出品マスタ情報" T1, ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T3."商品管理番号", T3."色", ROW_NUMBER() OVER(partition BY T3."商品管理番号" ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(T3."並び順",'999')) NB FROM "MASTER_出品マスタ情報" T3 WHERE T3."商品種別" = '子商品' AND T3."店舗名" = :shop ) TEMP WHERE TEMP.NB = 1 ) T4, "MASTER_写真情報" T5
WHERE T1."商品管理番号" = T4."商品管理番号" AND T1."色" <> T4."色" AND T1."商品種別" = '子商品' AND T1."店舗名" = :shop AND T4."商品管理番号" = T5."商品管理番号" AND T1."色" = T5."色" AND T1."店舗名" = T5."店舗名" ORDER BY T1."商品管理番号",TO_NUMBER(T1."並び順",'999')

SELECT T1."商品名" as productname, T1."出品者SKU" as sku, T1."ASIN 1" as asin FROM "INPUT_出品詳細情報" T1 LEFT JOIN "MASTER_出品マスタ情報" T2 ON T2."SKU番号" = T1."出品者SKU" and T2."ASIN番号" = T1."ASIN 1" and T2."店舗名" = :shop WHERE T2."SKU番号" IS NULL AND T1."店舗名" = :shop ORDER BY T1."商品名"
SELECT "出品者SKU" as SKU, "ASIN 1" as ASIN, "商品名" as PRODUCTNAME FROM "INPUT_出品詳細情報" A WHERE A."商品名" LIKE concat('%', :freeword ,'%') AND A."店舗名" = :shop

INSERT INTO "MASTER_出品マスタ情報" VALUES ( :shop,--店舗名 :col0,--商品管理番号 :col1,--商品分類 :col2,--SKU番号 :col3,--ASIN番号 :col4,--ラベル番号 :col5,--商品名称 :col6,--価格 :col7,--FBM在庫数量 :col8,--FBM在庫数量 :col9,--FBA在庫数量 :col10,--商品種別 :col11, --出品タイプ :col12, --写真 :col13, --並び順 :col14, --色 :col15 --サイズ )

SELECT T2."ラベル番号" as LABEL, T1."商品名" as PRODUCTNAME, T1."価格" as PRICE, T1."数量" as FBMQUANTITY, T2."在庫数量" as FBAQUANTITY FROM "INPUT_出品詳細情報" T1 LEFT JOIN "INPUT_FBA在庫情報" T2 ON T1."出品者SKU" = T2."SKU番号" AND T1."ASIN 1" = T2."ASIN番号" WHERE T1."出品者SKU" = :sku AND T1."ASIN 1" = :asin AND T1."店舗名" = :shop
DELETE FROM "MASTER_出品マスタ情報" T1 WHERE T1."商品管理番号" = :productno AND T1."店舗名" = :shop
DELETE FROM "MASTER_写真情報" T1 WHERE T1."商品管理番号" = :productno AND T1."店舗名" = :shop
INSERT INTO "MASTER_写真情報" VALUES ( :shop,--店舗名 :col0,--商品管理番号 :col1,--色 :col2 --写真 )
